William Brown

  1. Foster Name: William Paul
  2. Foster Family: Michael and Hilda Landkamer
  3. Location of Family: Powell, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Grand Island, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1920-09-01, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 1 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), 389-401; Patricia J. Young and Frances E. Marks, Tears on Paper: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), 183-189; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
